## WebAuthContainer.getLoginRedirectResult() method

Gets SSO login result.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLoginRedirectResult(): Promise<User | null>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User | null>`

## Remarks

This function should be called by the page at `callbackURL`<!-- -->, after calling [WebAuthContainer.loginOAuthProviderWithRedirect()](./web.webauthcontainer.loginoauthproviderwithredirect.md)<!-- -->.
